Speaker Profile

Gonzalo Villalta Puig

Head of the School of Law and Politics

The University of Hull

Before his recent appointment at the University of Hull, Professor Villalta Puig was Professor of Law and Associate Dean (Research) and Associate Dean (Development and External Affairs) of the Faculty of Law at The Chinese University of Hong Kong. He has been Reader in Law at the University of Hull, where he was the School of Lawâ€™s Director of Learning and Teaching, and Senior Lecturer in Law at La Trobe University.
